any trait or attribute proper to a thing; characteristic quality; peculiarity; esp. any of the principal characteristics of a substance, as determined by the senses or by its effect on another substance; natural (either physical or chemical) property.

ಧರ್ಮ ಕೊಡು dharma koḍu to donate charitably; ಧರ್ಮದ ಏಟು dharmada ēṭu (coll.) punishment awarded by a mob without using reason or without considering facts; ಧರ್ಮ ನೀಡು dharma nīḍu = ಧರ್ಮ ಕೊಡು; ಧರ್ಮ ಮಾಡು dharma māḍu to engage in generous, charitable work; 2. to donate charitably; ಧರ್ಮ ಹಾಕು dharma hāku = ಧರ್ಮ ಕೊಡು.
